events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate, including their resume and cover letter highlighting relevant experience.
The application for the Software Engineer role has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department based on the candidate’s background and keywords.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate’s profile and coordinate the next steps of the hiring process.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidate’s technical skills and cultural fit with the engineering team.
The candidate responded positively to the initial screening and expressed strong enthusiasm for the software engineering position and company mission.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the lead developer to evaluate the candidate’s coding and problem-solving skills in depth.
